set(ROOT_PROJECT_COMPILE_OPTIONS
    ${SWIFTSHADER_COMPILE_OPTIONS}
    ${WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS}
)

set(WSI_SRC_FILES
    VkSurfaceKHR.cpp
    VkSurfaceKHR.hpp
    VkSwapchainKHR.cpp
    VkSwapchainKHR.hpp
)

if(WIN32)
    list(APPEND WSI_SRC_FILES
        Win32SurfaceKHR.cpp
        Win32SurfaceKHR.hpp
    )
elseif(LINUX)
    if(X11)
        list(APPEND WSI_SRC_FILES
            XlibSurfaceKHR.cpp
            XlibSurfaceKHR.hpp
            libX11.cpp
            libX11.hpp
        )
    endif()

    if(XCB)
        list(APPEND WSI_SRC_FILES
            XcbSurfaceKHR.cpp
            XcbSurfaceKHR.hpp
        )
    endif()

    if(WAYLAND)
        list(APPEND WSI_SRC_FILES
            WaylandSurfaceKHR.cpp
            WaylandSurfaceKHR.hpp
        )
    endif()
elseif(APPLE)
    list(APPEND WSI_SRC_FILES
        MetalSurface.mm
        MetalSurface.hpp
    )
endif()

add_library(vk_wsi EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL
    ${WSI_SRC_FILES}
)

set_target_properties(vk_wsi PROPERTIES
    POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 1
    FOLDER "SwiftShader VK"
)

target_include_directories(vk_wsi
    PUBLIC
        ".."
        "${SWIFTSHADER_DIR}/include"
)

target_compile_options(vk_wsi
    PRIVATE
        ${ROOT_PROJECT_COMPILE_OPTIONS}
)

target_link_options(vk_wsi
    PUBLIC
        ${SWIFTSHADER_LINK_FLAGS}
)

target_link_libraries(vk_wsi
    PUBLIC
        vk_pipeline
)
